author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

The main goal of this PR is to migrate to `esConsumes` the `Calibration/TkAlCaRecoProducer` subsystem (as part of issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31061)
I profit of this PR to perform also the following:

   * remove few strays `#include "FWCore/Framework/interface/ESHandle.h"` left from previous migrations
   * address the `"UnkownType"` => `"UnknownType"` typo highlighted in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32363#discussion_r537865648
   * `Calibration/TkAlCaRecoProducers/plugins/PCLMetadataWriter.h` is removed and all code included in the `.cc` (as recommended for plugins).

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport, no backport needed.
title: Migrate Calibration/TkAlCaRecoProducers to esConsumes and other fixes
